result.execSummary:
All charges against Johnny Karl Pinder in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Johnny Karl Pinder is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in court with attorney Glenn Oswald Givens.  Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in custody.  John J Rejowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant appears via Zoom. State filed motion to dismiss. Defense has no objection. Court orders case dismissed without prejudice.
State's Notice of Motion to Dismiss (without prejudice)

Attorney Glenn Oswald Givens in court, defendant Johnny Karl Pinder not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense previously filed motion to dismiss and requests a motion hearing date. Case adjourned for motion hearing, Branch 02.  Motion hearing scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Filed: Motion to Dismiss Due To Speedy Trial Violation.

Attorney Glenn Oswald Givens in court, defendant Johnny Karl Pinder not in court, in custody.  James  Griffin for Patrick O'Keefeappeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Case adjourned for status of counsel hearing by Zoom.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Johnny Karl Pinder not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for motion hearing. Due to technical difficulties, defendant not produced. Case rescheduled off the record. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Motion hearing scheduled for March 3, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Motion for Withdrawal of Counsel, filed

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Johnny Karl Pinder not in court, in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a motion to withdraw date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Motion hearing scheduled for February 4, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in court with Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for plea hearing.  Judge Shelton recused herself.  Case reassigned to Judge Milton Childs, Branch 2.  Case adjourned for status conference in Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for January 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Plea hearing scheduled for 12/3/21 at 10:00 am via zoom. Status conference scheduled for today's date canceled.

Matter set for Scheduling Conference. Defendant in custody in the Wisconsin State Prison system. CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD WITH THE APPROVAL OF THE JUDGE.
Branch 40 is in jury trial on another matter; case heard off the record. Court granted defense request for time to receive/review case by email.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for September 17, 2021 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in court with Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in custody.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  ALL PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Motions on behalf of the defense presented to the Court. All motions are denied at this time. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Shorewood Police Officer J. Schaal.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 20.   
Effective August 1, 2021, this calendar will be assigned to Honorable Danielle Shelton - Branch 40, in Room 634 of the Courthouse.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 17, 2021 at 08:30 am.
received and filed.

Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in court by video with Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent who appears in person as a friend of the court.  Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in custody.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. SPD needs more time to appoint counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 20, 2021 at 10:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Rozek Law Offices and 3970 N Oakland Ave., Village of Shorewood, Wisconsin.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.

Pretrial Order, signed and filed.

02:29 PM Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Defendant Johnny Karl Pinder in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wall, Branch 20.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Court preserved Defendant's rights to raise motion on Statute of Limitations before trial court.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 28, 2021 at 10:00 am.
MCSO did not provide executed warrant at time of scheduling.  Defendant at Racine Correctional Institution.
Letter from defendant re:  dismissal of retainer.  (Johnny K. Pinder - #147966, Racine Correctional Institution - UNIT: Milwaukee West - R/1102, PO Box 900, Sturtevant WI 53177).
